description:
SIP Privacy is a privacy-first Solana wallet that shields your transactions using stealth addresses and Pedersen commitments.

KEY FEATURES:
• Shielded Payments - Send SOL privately with hidden sender, amount, and recipient
• Stealth Addresses - One-time addresses prevent transaction linking
• Viewing Keys - Share read-only access for compliance
• Jupiter DEX - Swap tokens with optional privacy
• Background Scanning - Get notified of new payments
• Multiple Privacy Providers - SIP Native, Arcium, Privacy Cash, and more

PRIVACY BY DEFAULT:
• Pedersen Commitments hide transaction amounts
• Stealth addresses prevent tracking
• Viewing keys enable selective disclosure

COMPLIANCE READY:
• Export viewing keys for auditors
• Track disclosures with expiration
• Generate compliance reports
• Privacy score dashboard

SECURITY:
• Native key management
• Seed Vault support (Seeker/Saga)
• Biometric authentication
• No third-party custody
release_notes: Initial release with shielded payments, Jupiter DEX integration, and viewing key management.
